meanings.sent1: In math class, we learned about the seventeens today.
meanings.sent2: She turned eighteen last week, so she's in her seventeens now.
meanings.sent3: The seventeen-year-olds at the party were the life of the event.
meanings.sent4: The excitement of turning seventeen felt like stepping into a new world.
meanings.sent5: The beauty of the sunset painted the sky in shades of the seventeens.

meanings.definition: Members of a group aged between 17 and 19.
meanings.sent1: The group of friends consisted of several seventeens.
meanings.sent2: At the high school, the seventeens were known for their energy.
meanings.sent3: The seventeens at the concert danced like there was no tomorrow.
meanings.sent4: Their bond as seventeens was unbreakable, like a chain of strength.
meanings.sent5: The laughter of the seventeens echoed through the halls of the school.

meanings.definition: A set of 17 items or units.
meanings.sent1: The store sold a pack of seventeens for a discounted price.
meanings.sent2: The toolbox was missing one of the seventeens.
meanings.sent3: The baker needed exactly seventeen eggs to make the cake.
meanings.sent4: The garden had a row of seventeen flowers blooming beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The shelf displayed a collection of seventeens, each unique in its own way.
